content.html: Remote work opens the option for nomad life, but it also adds the option for the exact opposite... Settling down. Instead of constantly moving for the best job offer you can: • Stay • Put down roots • Build closer connections • Get involved in your community
content.value:
Remote work opens the option for nomad life, but it also adds the option for the exact opposite... Settling down.

Instead of constantly moving for the best job offer you can:

• Stay
• Put down roots
• Build closer connections
• Get involved in your community
